item.description:
Breakfast with Candidate for Massachusetts Governor
Charlie Baker



Please join Charlie Baker and Richard Tisei for a Breakfast Meet & Greet

Saturday April 10th 9:00 â€“ 10:30 AM Westborough Doubletree Hotel (5400 Computer Drive)

The breakfast is free and open to the public. This is a great opportunity to listen to Charlie and Richard discuss their vision for Massachusetts and answer any questions you may have. Charlie has been all over the airwaves lately discussing his plans to reform Mass Health and the RMV. Let
s hear what he has to say.

To RSVP please click the link below
https://bakerforgov.w...

If you have any questions about the event, please contact Matt St. Hilaire at msthilaire@charliebaker2010.com.
item.name: Tea Party Breakfast with Charlie Baker, candidate for MA Governor
